Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.game.components

Class GoalPattern

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.game.components.GoalSymbol
IS24_LB11.game.components.GoalPattern
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardInterface, GoalCard, JsonConvertable
public class GoalPattern extends GoalSymbol
Represents a goal pattern in the game. Extends the functionality of a GoalSymbol by adding a variant and direction.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface IS24_LB11.game.components.CardInterface

    INVALID_DIGIT_MSG, INVALID_SEQUENCE_MSG, NOT_A_DIGIT_MSG, SHORT_ID_MSG

    Constructor
    Description
    GoalPattern(String id)
    Construct a GoalPattern from the information encoded in the given String with the following syntax: char 0-3 : same syntax followed by GoalSymbol char 4 : represents the pattern's variant (expected 'D' or 'L') char 5 : represents the pattern's direction

  • Constructor Details

    • GoalPattern

      public GoalPattern(String id) throws SyntaxException
      Construct a GoalPattern from the information encoded in the given String with the following syntax: char 0-3 : same syntax followed by GoalSymbol char 4 : represents the pattern's variant (expected 'D' or 'L') char 5 : represents the pattern's direction
      Parameters:
      id - a String containing the encoded information that identify the card
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the information are not correctly encoded or missing
